message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling more generous than you, but this is a limited-time offer!
Don't push your luck, Bob. This is my counter-offer.  Take it or leave it.
Okay Alice, let's be real. A 50/50 split is the fairest and we both lose out if this drags on.
